title: EUROPE RESEARCH ROUNDUP- Geberit , Hexpol, Ontex Group , Hexpol,
text:
â€© Feb 26 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Geberit , Hexpol and Ontex Group , on Friday.

HIGHLIGHTS

* Ackermans & Van Haaren : KBC Securities raises to accumulate from hold

* Geberit AG : Deutsche Bank initiates with hold rating and CHF 530 target price

* Hexpol AB : Berenberg starts with sell rating; price target SEK 84

* Ontex Group NV : JP Morgan cuts to neutral from overweight

* URW : RBC cuts to sector perform from outperform

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Friday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* Aalberts NV : ING raises target price to EUR 45 from EUR 42.40
